name: Hair Retreat & Co
address: The Westbrook Centre, 5 Grassmere Way, Slough SL1 8SE, UK

reviews.text: Can't rate Lucy and Hair Retreat highly enough! Lucy listened to all the problems I have with my hair, gave me lots of tips and did a fantastic job of cutting my hair. I was worried about styling it myself but after using the advice given by Lucy I couldn't be happier. Found my new regular hairdressers!

I have just had the best day! Went to the Hair Retreat for hair colouring/ reverse balayage with Ella. An amazing experience from start to finish and I feel like me again. So happy with the result and I can‚Äôt thank Ella enough for listening to what I would like and achieving the end result. I didn‚Äôt feel rushed or anxious at any point and each step was explained and I was consulted throughout the process. Thank you so much again! Josie xx

Firstly, if you are looking for a beautiful, friendly, professional salon then look no further than The Hair Retreat.

Millie and Ella make you feel welcome and very much at ease and the salon is beautifully laid out.

Secondly, if you're looking for someone who will give you a fantastic Brazilian Blow dry, look no further than Millie. Millie talked me through the whole process and all the way through as well. Millie turned my cork screw curls in to the most soft, shiny, beautiful feeling straight hair and I LOVE IT!

Thank you so much Millie and I'll see you for my next treatment in July.

Give The Hair Retreat, you won't be disappointed!

What a warm welcome we had from everyone at the Hair retreat! Ella was fantastic and not only did a great job with my unruly hair but also took the time to show me how to blow dry it to get it to 'behave better' and great advise to get it in better condition. My children also were made to feel very welcome too whilst they waited and are booked in next week. Thank you Ella, can't wait to come back and highly recommend! Fliss üôÇ

10/10. Couldn't recommend The Hair Retreat enough! Such a welcoming, friendly and relaxing salon. Millie was so thorough throughout the whole process and took so much care to make sure my hair ended up exactly how i asked for. Extremely happy and already looking forward to going back for my next hair appointment! x

name: Summers and Co Hair Boutique @ The Farmhouse Sanctuary
address: 214 Catherington Ln, Catherington, Slough SL2 0TA, UK

reviews.text: Katie is the best hairdresser I've had. Her staff are always friendly, so the salon has a lovely welcoming atmosphere.

I had my first hair appointment with Danielle, and it was a wonderful experience from start to finish. She was incredibly welcoming and professional, which immediately put me at ease. Danielle took the time to listen to what I wanted and made sure I felt comfortable throughout the entire appointment. I left feeling confident and very happy with the results. Highly recommend!

I absolutely love visiting Summer & Co. ‚Äì it‚Äôs always such a treat! Gemma is so lovely and instantly puts me at ease. She really listens to what I want, gives thoughtful advice on styles that will suit me, and her talent always shines through in the results.

It‚Äôs more than just a haircut ‚Äì spending time in the salon feels like therapy. You can relax, get things off your chest, and have a good giggle at the same time. I always leave feeling lighter, happier, and with hair I absolutely love. Couldn‚Äôt recommend Gemma and the team enough!

It was lovely coming in to meet with Danielle for a colour consultation today, we had a lovely chat and she really listened to me. I didnt feel rushed at all and she was full of infomation and ideas. I'm looking forward to coming back in a few weeks for my first appoinment in this beautiful setting  :)

From my very first consultation to the final result, I cannot fault the overall experience. Ella was incredibly informative, guiding me through the journey of going from a dull blonde to a vibrant, deep red. Her skill and customer service were so impressive. She made sure I was comfortable and happy at every step. Her knowledge really stood out too, giving me great advice on the best products to maintain my new colour. Overall, I‚Äôm absolutely delighted with the results and I‚Äôm really looking forward to continuing my hair care journey with Summers & Co at the Farmhouse Sanctuary! Thank you!

name: The Bros Barber
address: 345 Milton Rd, Slough SL2 8LH, UK

reviews.text: Great service 10/10 hair cut highly recommend for people to come here. Aiden gave me a sharp trim.
Fantastic barbers, all the guys are very friendly and skilled at what they do.

Very good service and advice for my hair
Workers are kind and friendly
Such an amazing place to get your hair done! They are chatty, friendly and very approachable with what you want done for your hair.
Best barbers around, Brilliant guys with a brilliant service !

name: TOP G Barbers
address: 2 Grassmere Way, Slough SL1 8SE, UK

reviews.text: Overall, I highly recommend for any parent looking for a professional, kid-friendly salon. We'll definitely be returning for our next haircut!
Very happy with service and cut. Patient with child and finished it with bit of fun spray of colour. Will be back. :-) thank you
Thought I‚Äôd give it a try as just opened nearby. He was friendly, great haircut and went above and beyond, for a great price. Would recommend trying it out!
Great service and friendly staff.  Best haircut I‚Äôve had in years and open on a Sunday.  Really impressed, thank you
The first time I came to this barber, the welcomed me in a very friendly way. They do very good haircuts and they are professionals

name: JC Barbering
address: 4 Frogmore Ln, Slough SL2 9QQ, UK

reviews.text: Last minute appointment, totally rushed! In & out in under 15 minutes for a skin fade... One side was wonky on the fade and the cut had bits sticking out on both back/sides that I had to ask myself (twice) for it to be cut. Was a shame as I'm local and was hoping it to be good.
Fantastic place, cuts perfect every time wouldn't go anywhere else highly recomend

Jordan is brilliant. Nice to chat too, and is a master of the hair. I decided this time to change how I had my hair for the last 15 years, and he talked me through a few ideas and I couldn't be happier.
Great service very good haircut very happy will be back again soon
I would recommend JC barbering, brilliant service, very professional & knowledgeable. Easy to talk to

name: Mo‚Äôs Barber
address: 2 St George's Walk, Slough SL1 7EH, UK

reviews.text: We've literally just been and our 5YO son has left with the most stylish hair cut. He has additional needs and was anxious leading up to it but has never been so chilled whilst getting his hair cut. The barber and the calming music really helped relax him and, dare I say, I think he enjoyed it! He also has a double crown, so can make it hard to cut but they nailed it! Impressed and grateful - will definitely return!
My son loved his Renaldo haircut with blue spray. Thank you so much. We will be back again soon!
Went for a simple haircut, looked great, lovely barber, good price, would recommend

We love coming here with our three year old son he used to cry the hole time at the hairdresser screamed to have his hair cut untill we can here the man is so friendly and patient with him even has cool coloured hair spray my kids think is great to have blue hair
Great barber, quick, efficient, thorough and great haircut. Lovely guy also. And very reasonable price. Highly recommended.

name: Hambledon Barber
address: Hambledon Parade, Slough SL1 6XE, UK

reviews.text:
I recently visited this establishment with my child for a haircut. After waiting for approximately 30 minutes, the barber told me that he was ‚Äútoo busy‚Äù to attend to us and asked us to leave.

What was particularly upsetting is that he was willing to serve customers who arrived after us, yet refused to serve my child.

There was no apology for the wasted time.

He was pathetically unprofessional and disrespectful towards us.

This experience left both me and my child feeling unwelcome ,unfairly treated and humiliated.

Well,they take only cash in hand what more can I expect from them.
Lovely barbers, defo go again. Did the haircut perfectly and was a lovely man

This is the third time I've been here and it's gotten progressively worse but today was a very bad experience. Extremely miserable hairdresser, not friendly and didn't listen to a word I said. Actually started cutting my hair before I'd even finished asking for what I wanted. Terrible service and I walked out knowing I'll never go back.

Mohammed did a fantastic job! I saw him today for the first time and I will be returning again. I got a skin fade which was reasonably priced ¬£17. I will be recommending him to more people in my area! Thanks üëç

I've had quite a few cuts from here, it's always a 70% chance they do a bad job. My last few have been abysmal. Missing parts of my hair and leaving them uncut, completely disregarding what I want and giving me a buzz cut or giving me a service I don't want than charging me for it. I don't recommend

name: Golden cut barbers
address: 12, Slough SL1 7DT, UK

reviews.text:
Great laugh knew how to make us all laugh. Trimmed eyebrows no hassle and gave a good trim.
Fuming he found a grey hair üò°
My go to every weekend! Always a brilliant beard trim.
Sarwar is a top barber, great service, always cuts my hair perfect
Always give our little boy an amazing cut. We took him to quite a few salons before finding one we like. The staff are super friendly, and our little boy loves getting a lollipop after his hair cut.

Had a haircut this morning and had a poor experience as it was done by an inexperienced trainee.
I had few a blade cuts and bleeding on my forehead, hair was very short at the front, long at the middle and back of head .
In short ,I looked like a clown at the end of my haircut.
I had to spent another ¬£13 with another barber in the area to get myself presentable.
One kind request to the owner,please make sure that you support your students and don‚Äôt experiment with your longtime clients.

name: Mr H Barber
address: 12 Wellington Wy, Slough SL1 7ED, UK

reviews.text: Went here today (on a Sunday) with my 2 boys ages 2 and 5. They loved the rocket ship chair, the lolly and the their new hair, my 2 yr old wasn‚Äôt sure at first but the guy was so patient and kind. No clippers all scissors and a great job.

My partner went in here on the off chance as his regular barber was away. So pleased he did best haircut he‚Äôs ever had! Took there time he said he‚Äôs never felt so pampered. Highly recommended he‚Äôll definitely be back üëçüèª

We went to Slough to go to our usual - Gino' Bambinos - only to find that they had closed down. I decided to try Mr H Barbers instead, and I am so pleased that I did. My son is 20 months old and absolutely hates having his hair cut. The guy who looked after us was excellent with him and so gentle. I am so pleased with the cut, too. It's the best one he's ever had. I was very happy to pay ¬£12 for this service. Thank you. We will be back very soon.

H Barbershop is a cut above the rest. The skilled barbers deliver top-notch haircuts with precision and style. The friendly atmosphere and attention to detail make every visit a pleasure. A grooming experience you won't forget!

Absolutely first class! My previous barber recently retired, and this was my first visit to Mr H. - really great service and the best haircut I have had in years. No hesitation in recommending this new business and I‚Äôll definitely be having my haircut there in future üòÄ

name: Studio H
address: 2b London Rd, Horndean, Slough SL2 0BZ, UK

reviews.text:
Great service and price. ¬£32.50 for a cut and style for me and my 7 year old! That's hard to beat.
Baggy was awesome and really helped my Autistic son with his nerves and sensory issues. He managed to have his first haircut using clippers thanks to Baggy.
Worth the drive from Portsmouth for the service and value!

The staff were very welcoming and kind a really nice bunch of people. My hair was cut by Jung one of the barbers there, He was extremely professional and a really nice guy just to talk to. Overall this is the best barber I have ever been too, I loved the final result of my hair and i will be coming back here every time I need my hair cut 11/10

Great experience and very friendly atmosphere. Jung was so nice with my boys and they both said it was the best barber ever and they want to always come back to this place. Thank you Jung and Studio H and happy to see you again.

My son usually hates having his haircut but came out today and said ‚ÄòI think Baggy is the best barber I‚Äôve had‚Äô. And 9 year olds don‚Äôt lie! :-) Baggy is always very patient and takes his time, and remembers what we ask for too between visits.

This salon was amazing. As a woman barbershops can seem intimidating but they were extremely welcoming and friendly. They listened carefully to what I wanted and delivered better than expected. They took their time and used their expertise to give me an excellent cut. A wonderful service and really nice team.

name: Jakes gentleman's salon
address: 119 London Rd, Slough SL1 7DZ, UK

reviews.text: I bring my 4-year-old son here regularly for haircuts and we always have a great experience! The team is friendly, welcoming and we‚Äôve never had a bad cut. Amazing barbershop - highly recommend!

I‚Äôve been going to Jake‚Äôs since he opened in 2019.

The personal experience has always been excellent.

His crew are very experienced and no matter who attends to me I walk out pleased and always have a sociable experience.

Fantastic Barbers.

We‚Äôve been bringing our 4 year old here for a couple of years now, always so welcoming and amazing at what they do. Could not recommend this place enough, amazing with adults as well as children! My son now loves having his hair!!

Good staff and I get good haircuts apart from 1 barber in there. I have now had him twice and both times he has cut my crown way to short so the back of head just sticks up. He also has not listened to my request about leaving the back a little longer and instead has cut it short.
I‚Äôve been coming to this barber for 2/3 years now, Emad (Jake) does a perfect skin fade every time. Friendly welcoming staff, always clean in the shop and enjoy the visit every time.

name: Aiden barber
address: 65 London Rd, Langley, Slough SL2 8UJ, UK

reviews.text: Went for a beard trim and staff was very friendly and helpful. And they listened to what I said and done a fantastic job. It's nice to come in and be just relax and they make u feel very welcome. Will definitely be coming back.
Haircut and shave today. Great service and came out looking good.
best trim of all time my barber can smd
Had a cut by the boss today and the service was excellent. Very friendly and chatty which makes a nice change from other barbers. I would definitely recommend to anyone üëç

Great hair cut, been here a few times and will return. Not rushed and exactly what I wanted.

Edit: Unfortunately my further visit wasn‚Äôt the 5 stars like before, had multiple cuts made to the side of my head with the razor and no apology was made, even with blood visible. This put me on edge especially as I didn‚Äôt see the equipment cleaned in between customers.

name: Bovers Barbershop
address: Basepoint business centre, 9 Waterberry Dr, Slough SL1 7TH, UK

reviews.text: My boys have been getting their haircut by Jack for years. Always happy with their cuts. Great new salon‚Ä¶ love the Pac-Man arcade.
Been booking in for a skin fade with Jack regularly now and always gives a top service!! Never disappoints. Would recommend to anyone
friendly barber, very good at his job and a lovely barber shop
Always spot on

name: Belle De Vie Hair & Beauty Salon
address: 32 North Rd, Clanfield, Slough SL2 0EH, UK

reviews.text: I take my Grandma to have her hair done every week with Tina, she's marvelous, Grace and Rosie are amazing too. My grandma is very happy with her hair everytime we leave. They make us feel very comfortable and will come back regularly. üòÉ

I recently had my hair dyed by Sabrina at Belle De Vie. The whole team were very friendly, and the colour result was exactly as I hoped. After two weeks, the colour remains vibrant and I still love the outcome! Thank youüòä
Beautiful hair cut, such a lovely team of ladies, and an amazing new venue! So pleased to see it all working out so well. Thank you. üíï

always the best service! Had my hair done a few times here now plus eyelash lift and tint and also eyelash extensions. Couldn‚Äôt recommend them enough! Always talk through everything with me first & make sure I‚Äôm satisfied with what is being done. Also get w complimentary tray with a coffee, sugar, milk, chocolates and biscuits!  Always professional and so friendly! Makes me feel so comfortable every time I walk through their door!

Love this place. They were originally in Petersfield and now in Clanfield and Id rather travel that little bit further than find someone else. I go in with challenging nail length, challenging nail condition an challenging nail wants and they always work miracles. Theyre very friendly and very helpful, always feel welcomed. Went in recently with my biggest ask yet with shellac halloween nails.

name: Hair raising
address: 4-5, Portsmouth Rd, Horndean, Slough SL2 9LA, UK

reviews.text: Just had my hair done and so happy with it. Found my new hairdressers and even better that it‚Äôs local. Jo is professional bubbly and knows her stuff. Couldn‚Äôt be happier with my colour. Thank you!
Had a haircut and full head of foils with Shauna today. She knows her story with colour and the cut was lovely. Will definitely make her my new Hair Stylist. Excellent, friendly service from Shauna
Very good hairdresser, always very happy with the service and Jo is very friendly and helpful. Reasonably priced and good value. I wouldn't go anywhere else.
Incredible ü©µ Such a lovely bunch of ladies there! ü©µüåçüôè
Always happy great prices and fable staff

name: Sabrina's Hair Lounge
address: 3 Monkwood Cl, Havant PO9 4QE, UK

reviews.text:
üåü 5 Stars ‚Äì Amazing Curly Cut! üåü
I booked the complete curl package and it was such a treat! The detox and Olaplex treatments made my hair feel amazing, and the scalp massage was so relaxing.

Sabrina was absolutely lovely ‚Äî friendly, knowledgeable, and clearly passionate about curls. She took the time to really understand my hair and talk me through every step, giving me loads of tips for styling and care.

The cut itself is perfect ‚Äî my curls feel so light, bouncy, and defined again. I left feeling totally refreshed and confident. Highly recommend Sabrina if your curls need a little TLC! üíï

Sabrina was patient, incredibly knowledgeable and great at managing my nerves as a new client! I went in hating my hair after a bad cut elsewhere and came out feeling like myself again - she knew exactly how to cut my thick wavy bixie and has given me a manageable cut that I can enjoy. She was excellent.

Sabrina is a lovely person, she made me feel very welcome and relaxed, she listened to how I wanted my hair,went through colour charts, she cut my hair exactly how I wanted it, I would recommend Sabrina to anyone who wants a excellent hairdresser.

Sabrina was great! I‚Äôve had the same hairdresser my whole life and since moving house I needed to find a new one so of course I was nervous but she proved me wrong. Her work was great and she is such a lovely person. Will definitely use her as my regular hairdresser now!

This was my first visit to this gem of a hair salon. Sabrina was absolutely brilliant with my frizzy curls. She gave me loads of advice and guidance and I walked away with a fab haircut. It isn't easy to find hair dressers that understand curly hair and Sabrina absolutely does. I will definitely be back. Thank you so much! x

name: THE ART OF BARBERS
address: 28 Greywell Rd, Leigh Park, Havant PO9 5AL, UK

reviews.text:
I‚Äôve been getting my haircuts at The Art of Barbers for over 5 years, and I honestly wouldn‚Äôt go anywhere else. Edy and Fabian are true professionals ‚Äî always precise, friendly, and consistent with every cut. They take the time to make sure you leave looking your best and feeling confident.

The shop itself has an amazing atmosphere ‚Äî clean, comfortable, and welcoming. You can tell that Edy and Fabian genuinely care about their clients and take pride in their craft. Over the years, they‚Äôve become more than just my barbers; they feel like friends who always deliver top-quality work.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place that combines skill, style, and great vibes, The Art of Barbers is the spot. Highly recommend Edy and Fabian ‚Äî they‚Äôre the best in the business!

Had an excellent experience at this barbershop! The guys were attentive, professional, and very friendly from start to finish. I got a high fade, hot towel, and beard trim ‚Äî everything was done with great attention to detail. Easily one of the best cuts I‚Äôve had in a while. Highly recommend!

Had an amazing experience here at the Art Of Barbers, received a sharp trim by Edy, the whole staff were supper friendly and chill, if your looking to get a trim I would recommend these guys. Top man üëå.

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

I had the best experience at The Art of Barbers! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted by the friendly and professional team. The atmosphere is welcoming, and you can tell they truly care about their craft. My barber Edy, took the time to understand exactly what I wanted and gave me the perfect haircut and beard trim. The attention to detail was spot on, and I left feeling fresh and confident. The shop is clean, well-maintained, and has a great vibe. Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for top-notch service and a fantastic cut! I'll definitely be coming back. Thank you!
Fantastic barbers really friendly people. They do everything to make a man look younger. We will definitely go back.

name: Kai Mens Grooming Barbers
address: 39 North St, Havant PO9 1PP, UK

reviews.text:
The service that Lee offers is really good. You can book in advance, the day, time, and hairstyle you want on the app. Always get a notification, reminding you nearer the time.

Lee is a nice person, always gives you a warm welcome and chats to you throughout.

I‚Äôve lived in Havant for about 10 years and it‚Äôs taken me a long time to find the perfect barber. Lee is very understanding of hairstyles and what to do to improve your look plus he is a very easy guy to talk and my hair has never looked this good.
Highly recommend!
First time visiting and I wasn‚Äôt disappointed. Top-quality haircut and great conversation. Lee really listened to what I wanted from my hairstyle, and he absolutely delivered.
I‚Äôve been getting my haircut from Lee for years now, and I wouldn‚Äôt go anywhere else. He listens, gives great advice, and always gets it just right. Great value and super easy to book.

I have been with Lee for a couple of years now. He is top quality and always open to feedback and genuinely wants you to be really happy and content with every single haircut you have.
Top, top guy and high quality.

name: Aiden's barbers
address: 13 Park Parade, Leigh Park, Havant PO9 5AA, UK

reviews.text: Absolutely appalling services here, my nephew went in for a cut and used a picture on the front of shop as reference, but explained he wanted it longer in the fringe area, this was agreed, my nephew did leave with an unsatisfied cut but didn‚Äôt explain this at the time due to feeling uncomfortable to do so, did find the courage the next morning to go in and explain his unhappiness to be met with aggression and kicked out of the shop, I his aunt then returned with him calmly to speak to said guy and was told it was a good cut I explained it was awful and that it would be appropriate for a refund so that I could take him somewhere else to have it corrected, I was also then met with aggression and a refusal of a refund or even so much as a part refund, this guy done an awful hair cut and then became aggressive to his customer when told he wasn‚Äôt happy with it, so unprofessional, and we will certainly not be returning again, I hope no one else makes the same mistake !

Amazing barbers, went there today for the first time, and the service was that impeccable I had to leave a nice tip, this will be my barbers from now on, fantastic attention to detail , kind and friendly service.
Very friendly and really amazing at his job, also fantastic with children hair cuts this is the only place I take my soon too üòÄ

Great Barber, took my 5 yo boy for his first proper haircut as he‚Äôs always been hesitant. After a few times watching his dad get his hair cut here he was ready for his turn, Barber had the perfect temperament and has done a brilliant job! Can‚Äôt recommend enough.

Had a Groom Package. Hair cut, Wet Shave (including face scrub and massage ¬£5 extra), Ear & Nose wax and hair wash with finished style. Well worth the money, very relaxing and enjoyable.
Highly recommend
Also very polite and family friendly.

name: KAPODOKIA TRADITIONAL TURKISH BARBERS
address: 6 Greywell Rd, Leigh Park, Havant PO9 5AL, UK

reviews.text:
Absolutely great experience. The staff are friendly, professional, and very skilled, paying great attention to detail during the haircut and shave. The shop is clean and comfortable.

I also took my 3-year-old nephew with me, and he wasn‚Äôt scared at all. They were incredibly patient, kind, and attentive with him, which made the whole experience stress-free. It‚Äôs definitely a very family-friendly place. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a quality and trustworthy barber in Cappadocia. I will definitely come back!
These guys are quality. I been going regularly for the last 4 months, had a skin fade from every barber in there and always leave happy. They also do a great job with my 4 year old son.

Very professional, polite, kind and just overall great experience. Free tea and coffee, great chat about things local and not so local. Fantastic guys. Three years I've been coming here and will NEVER go anywhere else. Thank you very much. Jay.

Myself and my little boy get our haircuts here all the time and ny boy is very funny who and where he gets his haircut so he comes all the way up from Portsmouth to get his hair done by Ali who even put his skills to the test when my boy wanted the phil foden haircut which turned out unbelievable good considering he has blonde hair but you could still see the detail in his hair, 100% recommended barbers üëå
Was seen by Ali today for a walk in, had a fantastic beard trim and wet shave on the head. Ali had brilliant attention to detail and was super attentive, will definitely be coming back

name: Jim's Barber Shop
address: 7-9 South St, Havant PO9 1BU, UK

reviews.text: Very good service plus staff very helpful and friendly you can also have a laugh too
Always a great hair cut and friendly staff

I've been having my hair cut (what's left of it) at Jim's pretty well ever since he opened. Great welcoming and friendly atmosphere, good result and I've never been disappointed. Very reasonably priced as well.

Best Barbers in Havant ! Been coming here for years. I Highly recommend!  Everyone is friendly and welcoming, all the staff get along great and have good banta. Very professional and know what they are doing. My boy won‚Äôt get his hair cut any where else either.
Been going here 20+ years. All of the girls give first class haircuts, they take their time and do it right. Great value for money in my view. Keep it up :)

name: Istanbul Turkish Barbers
address: 27 West St, Havant PO9 1ER, UK

reviews.text:
Just outstanding service. Not too long wait. I've been offered a coffee or tea upon arrival. The barber was very good, amazing work with the trimmer. I have asked for a shave and it was just on another level. Shave, cream, burning ear hair and final hot towel to cover your face and back of your head.
Good attention to detail and fairly quick.
I DO RECOMMEND!

This place is amazing, took my 3 year old today for a trim and he isn't very good with getting a haircut. They were amazing with him, offering sweets and going above and beyond to cut his hair, managing to calm him down and get him relaxed and happy to have a haircut. Really cannot rate them enough, literally the only place I've been that can cut my little ones hair. Always a great service and I'll be continuing to use them in the future.
Very welcoming been going here since it opened got to know the owner and his son. Exceptional haircuts, eyebrow trim and always offers a refreshment and sweets for the kids. The best barbers there is

I was passing late this eve and asked if I could have a dry cut. So glad I did, as I couldn't be happier with the service. The young man that cut my hair was very professional, while still being friendly and he really did care about making sure I was happy with my haircut.
I always look for Turkish barbers, as I really appreciate the nose hair and eyebrow trim, plus flame removal of the hair from my ears nowadays. It's so much tidier now, even my daughter commented, how much better my hair looked. We were both offered a cup of tea or coffee too. They totally deserve 5 stars.

First time I have used them and I have to say, probably the most attentive and skilled barbers in Havant. My barber used scissors throughout and was extremely talented in their use.
A cup of coffee offered as I walked in made the experience more than ‚Äúgoing for a haircut ‚Äú and I will be back for a ‚Äúfull service ‚Äú soon!
Definitely worth using!

name: Florence Beauty Salon
address: 10 Market Parade, Havant PO9 1QF, UK

reviews.text: Lucky is incredible at what she does. She has been doing my waxing for 4 years and always does a perfect job! She is very professional, polite and friendly. Her shop is spacious, warm and very clean. 10/10 fantastic service. I would highly recommend.
Absolutely loved my eyebrow service! Very precise, clean, and perfectly shaped. The staff was friendly and made me feel comfortable. Highly recommend!
Just got my eyebrows done best experience. She is very professional in her work. Worth to choose her every single time. Thank you for making us beautiful lucky. Appreciate the efforts you put for us.
Brilliant salon, really professional service and very affordable prices.  I travel from Southampton as haven‚Äôt found a salon so good threading and waxing is amazing!

One of the best salon . Very nice lady . She is very hardworking and excellent in her work . No body can make better eye brows . she done it so perfectly. I personally recommend please must visit her at least once you will definitely go back to her .

name: Thairapybyemma
address: 8 Brookside Cl, Cippenham, Slough SL1 6ET, UK

reviews.text:
Amazing!! Emma is, without a doubt, the best hairdresser I‚Äôve had; I cannot recommend her highly enough. She is an incredibly talented colourist and her attention to detail is excellent. She genuinely cares about hair health and ensures that my hair looks and feels its best.

Emma is so warm and friendly, it‚Äôs a pleasure to spend time with her while getting my locks done. Truly authentic and reliable lady- Thanks Emma!

Emma has years of experience and still remains up to date with what's new and exciting in the hair world. Its great to have a hairdresser with such a passion and genuine care for how you hair looks!
I always cannot wait to see her for me next appointment!
Such talent and lovely lady!

Highly recommend Emma she is a professional lovely an patient very reliable an I‚Äôm always very happy when I have a visit , my hair is in so much better condition since I have been with her . Thanks again so much! Xx
Emma is a fantastic hairstylist, love my hair always takes time to listen and give you recommendations on how to achieve the look you want
Always so professional, gives excellent service and her advice is spot on. I am extremely pleased with the cut and the colour, I would definitely recommend Emma.

name: Grandeur Beauty
address: Hambledon Rd, Cippenham, Slough SL1 6NU, UK

reviews.text:
I've been having my nails done with Fiona at Grandeur for the last couple of years and wouldn't want to go anywhere else! They always last so well and the colour options are amazing.
Everyone is so welcoming and friendly.
Highly recommend!

I couldn't recommend Idy, Ivy & Fiona highly enough.  The salon is lovely & spotlessly clean.  They are also so talented with design.  I would also like to say they have been amazing & sympathetic with me needing to sometimes having to change my appointments as I've been undergoing Chemo.  Their products & colour range is excellent.  I wouldn't go anywhere else.
Love this salon and have already recommended friends to have their nails done here! Amazing work every time and all of the girls are so lovely!

I couldn‚Äôt recommend this Salon enough, I have been going regularly for over 2 years now and I honestly love it! Everybody is always super friendly, welcoming & accommodating - I love all the special little touches like hot water bottles in the winter, it makes it feel extra cosy and relaxing! My nails always look amazing and last so well, highly recommend ü•∞

I've been going to Fiona at Grandeur for a couple of years now. My nails were awful when I started going, but Fiona has made them wonderfully strong. They are all very good at what they do and I always get great comments on how lovely my nails look.
